body: And yet somehow this isn't NTR?.....Even with it in the name, it's not TAGGED NTR. AND SHUT THE FUCK UP from the usual NTRStands who use the "It has NTR in it's name, why did you click on it!" because when you do that, you can never use the "why don't you have it blacklisted then" excuse you also love to hurl around! When they don't tag like this properly after this long and so blunt! Then their doing this on purpose now! I think we deserve to know why and how the tagging process works if it's automated and if it's not then their incompetent at best, or purposely trying to start comment wars at worst! People have a right to know what the deal is. So please shut the fuck up! Not like I'll read or respond to the "usual shit" but lets save some trouble (not that this will work, can't reason with the unreasonable and the idiotic troll as they say and as it has been shown!)
